#Read in data
```{r}
wmh<-read_delim("G:/My Drive/Data/ALFA+/WMH/wmh_processed_regional_lobes.csv", 
    delim = ",", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)%>%
  filter(Visit == "V1")%>%
  dplyr::select(-Visit)

cognition<-read_excel("G:/My Drive/Data/ALFA+/Cognition/PACCv1_to_v3(incomplete).xlsx")%>%
  dplyr::select(IdParticipante, Visit, Z_PACC, FechaResultado)%>%
  rename(subject = IdParticipante)%>%
  mutate(subject = as.numeric(subject))%>%
  filter(Visit != 3)%>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = Visit, values_from = c(Z_PACC, FechaResultado))%>%
  mutate(PACC_diff = Z_PACC_2 - Z_PACC_1,
         time_diff = as.numeric(difftime(FechaResultado_2, FechaResultado_1, units= c("days"))))%>%
  dplyr::select(subject, PACC_diff, time_diff)

biomarkers<-read_delim("G:/My Drive/Data/ALFA+/biomarkers/biomarkers_CSF_processed.csv", 
    delim = ",", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)%>%
  filter(Visit == "V1")%>%
  dplyr::select(subject, A)

data_wmh<-read_delim("G:/My Drive/Data/ALFA+/ALFA_dataset_basic.csv", 
    delim = ",", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)%>%
  left_join(., wmh)%>%
  left_join(., cognition)%>%
  left_join(., biomarkers)

data_wmh_w<-data_wmh%>%
  filter(sex == 2)
```

#Model 1 - PACC ~ WMH

```{r}
mod_1<-lm(PACC_diff ~ volume_wmh + time_diff + APOE_binary + education + A, data = data_wmh_w[data_wmh_w$bilateral_region == "frontal",])
mod_2<-lm(PACC_diff ~ volume_wmh + time_diff + APOE_binary + education+ A, data = data_wmh_w[data_wmh_w$bilateral_region == "parietal",])
mod_3<-lm(PACC_diff ~ volume_wmh + time_diff + APOE_binary + education+ A, data = data_wmh_w[data_wmh_w$bilateral_region == "temporal",])
mod_4<-lm(PACC_diff ~ volume_wmh + time_diff + APOE_binary + education+ A, data = data_wmh_w[data_wmh_w$bilateral_region == "occipital",])
mod_5<-lm(PACC_diff ~ volume_wmh + time_diff + APOE_binary + education+ A, data = data_wmh_w[data_wmh_w$bilateral_region == "basal ganglia",])

summary(trafo_lm(mod_1))
summary(trafo_lm(mod_2))
summary(trafo_lm(mod_3))
summary(trafo_lm(mod_4))
summary(trafo_lm(mod_5))
```

no effect of WMH on PACC change between v1 and v2
